page.title: 06Village Shop
page.content: In our village there is only one shop.It is a combined general store, newsagents and post office.It is very convenient to shop there,otherwise we have to go to Newport,where there are several shops or Dundee which is a city with a great variety of shops of all sizes.The local shop is used by most people especially Senior citizens ,but most families only buy small quantities there.They prefer to shop in Dundee at large supermarkets such as Tesco or Asda where they have a greater selection and lower prices.The shop opens early in the morning at 07:00 and closes at 18:00 with a break for lunch between 13:00 and 14:00.Many school children buy sweets or crisps there each day when going to school.
